name: Online Homework
description: Can't find your sim's notebook? Well, now you can do their homework at any computer or laptop. This mod works for children, teens, and university students.

pages.title: Details
pages.html:
How to use

Click on any computer (including most CC) to do homework.

  • Children/Teens: Select the "Do Homework" interaction.
  • University Students: Go to the "University > University Coursework" menu, and then select the "Do Homework" interaction.

    • University homework requires the Discover University expansion pack.

Don't have Discover University?

No worries. You can still use this mod with the base game - it'll just ignore the university files.

pages.title: Changelog
pages.html:
1.1.1 (March 6, 2024)

  • Consolidate packages for easier installation
  • Clean up script to avoid conflicts for users with many script mods

1.1 (December 21, 2020)

  • Remove custom strings so that all languages are supported.
  • Add online homework for children and teens.

1.0.4 (November 15, 2020)

  • Add Polish translation (by Osqar).

1.0.3 (October 21, 2020)

  • Add Chinese translation (by MuMu).

1.0.2 (October 7, 2020)

  • Add French translation (by Kimikosoma).

1.0.1 (October 6, 2020)

  • Fix issue where Italian text showed up in the English version.

1.0 (October 6, 2020)

  • Add the ability to do university homework at any computer or laptop.
